entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 08:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.8°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
